Homework 1

Homework 2

Homework 3

%257B%2522id%2522%253A%2522clqbvvno800023b6hvklep68o%2522%252C%2522tabs%2522%253A%255B%255D%257D%252C%2522clqbvvno800053b6h2v3turgw%2522%253A%257B%2522id%2522%253A%2522clqbvvno800053b6h2v3turgw%2522%252C%2522tabs%2522%253A%255B%257B%2522id%2522%253A%2522clqbvvno800043b6hpi71ziap%2522%252C%2522mode%2522%253A%2522permanent%2522%252C%2522type%2522%253A%2522UNASSIGNED_PORT%2522%252C%2522port%2522%253A0%252C%2522path%2522%253A%2522%252F%2522%257D%255D%252C%2522activeTabId%2522%253A%2522clqbvvno800043b6hpi71ziap%2522%257D%252C%2522clqbvvno800033b6hb4usws2y%2522%253A%257B%2522tabs%2522%253A%255B%255D%252C%2522id%2522%253A%2522clqbvvno800033b6hb4usws2y%2522%257D%257D%252C%2522showDevtools%2522%253Atrue%252C%2522showShells%2522%253Afalse%252C%2522showSidebar%2522%253Atrue%252C%2522sidebarPanelSize%2522%253A15.069444444444443%257D
